author: Susannah Luthi and Carmen Paun
title: WHO chief calls for 'unity' after Trump funding threat
description: “With unity, with solidarity, at a national level and global level, resources will not be a problem,” Tedros said.
content:
My belief is that it will continue that way, he added. Thats what I believe. The U.S. will continue to contribute its share. Other countries will do the same.
Earlier on Wednesday, a WHO senior adviser said the organization had to work with China to understa… [+2045 chars]
